title: Coronavirus: AI steps up in battle against Covid-19

description: Fact-checking the week's most popular dodgy claims, including BCG jabs and Iran's highly dubious testing device.

description: Listen to some BBC correspondents and guests sharing the poems that have helped them through difficult moments.

title: Coronavirus: Electricity use up during day as nation works from home

description: "We haven't quite done the Joe Wicks workout. That might happen at some point."
